property.name: CertificationPduClaimCodes
property.description: Comma separated list of PDU claim codes to be applied when exam results are received.

property.name: CertificationPduClaimCodesForAttempt
property.description: Comma separated list of PDU claim codes to be applied when exam results are received (for attempt).

property.name: CertificationNumberRetries
property.description: Number of retries within eligibility duration

property.name: CertificationEligibilityDuration
property.description: Eligibility duration expressed in days (d), months (m) or years (y); e.g. 30d

property.name: CertificationLockoutPeriod
property.description: Lockout period (after configured # of failures) expressed in days (d), months (m) or years (y); e.g. 30d

property.name: CertificationLockoutDisabled
property.description: Whether or not to enforce lockout period after configured # of failures have been reached.

property.name: CertificationPassFailEmail
property.description: Whether or not send pass/fail emails.

property.name: CoursesRequiredToApply
property.description: Course(s) required to apply for a credential.

property.name: CredentialsRequiredToApply
property.description: Credential(s) required to apply for this credential.

property.name: ExamAnalysisEnabled
property.description: Determines if Exam Analysis is applicable or not
